Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is your <RED>map</RED>.
It shows the area around where
you are right now.
<PAGE>
The <BLUE>face with a light-blue outline</BLUE>
shows your current location.
<PAGE>
And my face shows my location. There
are pictures of buildings, too,
showing their locations.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now try moving around town while
looking at your map.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your first destination is to the upper
right of here.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, <MYNAME>!
Come over to here and talk to me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Excellent, you made it!
Now I'll give you a basic explanation
of what's ahead.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, I want you to go over by my
house. It's above here on the map.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now go to the <GREEN>plaza</GREEN>.
The plaza is to the left of this
vacant house.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now go to the house with the red roof
that's below on the map.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good, you made it! Let me tell you
a little bit about this house.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whoa, <MYNAME>! Not that way!
Come over here and talk to me!
